name: Moon Knight (Beamymars775475)
description:
Moon Knight is a platformer game where a knight is trying to escape a tower. However, things do not go as planned. Strange creatures are lurking in the darkness of the night and the moon light is the only thing that can save you. 

In this game, you’ll only have two controls, aside from movement: Dash, to reach further platforms, and throw a candle as an additional source of lighting, however, candles will lower your score.

Credits:

Game Designer / Programmer: Beamymars775475 (on itch.io)

Artist : MakishimuXIII#4630 (on Discord)

Sound Designer : Xiao#4464 (on Discord)

Made By Pandev Studios (created during the $100 Game Jam #1 in 2 weeks)
